content: परिकॢप् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To tend to. {@--2@} To give, grant, vouchsafe; <ls>U. 5. 27.</ls> {@--3@} To think. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To decide, determine. {@--2@} To fix upon, design, make or turn into; <ls>Ku. 1. 2.</ls> {@--3@} To prepare, get ready. {@--4@} To ondow with; <ls>Ś. 2. 9.</ls> {@--5@} To destine for. {@--6@} To perform, effect, accomplish. {@--7@} To contrive, invent, devise. {@--8@} To distribute. {@--9@} To invite.
